title: AttributeModifiers的问题
author: smyhw333

replies.author: 栗子z
replies.txt_content:
这么简单的问题都没人答。。。

已帮LZ改完：
/give @r minecraft:slime_ball 1 0 {display:{Name:生命之星,Lore:[神器，增加生命值]},Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:111,UUIDMost:111,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:111,UUIDMost:111,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Attack,Slot:offhand}]}

只用再加一个属性就好了

至于Slot选项可填：mainhand，offhand，head，legs，chest，feet
